documentation.title: File names
documentation.standard: To be able to find which class is contained in a file, file names should be case-insensitively equal to class names. Some operating systems and tools are case-insensitive, though other are. So, file names should be in lower case to avoid any trouble.

code_comparison.code: superclass.php // words not separated with underscores SuperClass.php // not in lower case and words not separated with underscores Super_class.php // not in lower case
